nodes.text: Koja nuts were a type of nut that possessed hard shells. During the rebellion on the Outer Rim planet Akiva in 4 ABY, the Zabrak bounty hunter Jas Emari saw the Imperial General Jylia Shale entering the Satrap's Palace in the world's capital city of Myrra while hiding beside the communications tower of the derelict Myrra capitol building. Emari recognized Shale and mentally labeled her appearance as old and shrunken-up like a gallstone, with the hardness of an uncracked koja nut. Koja nuts shared part of their name with koja-rum, a type of rum found on the Outer Rim planet Saleucami.
Koja nuts were first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
